speech.words: Please sit back and relax, I am just turining myself on.
The living room of the future is a go.
Thanks for waiting
The future always takes longer than you think to arrive
I will now create a personal experience for you whilst protecting the privacy of your data
Data means any information that is collected about you whilst in this room
This will be an immersive experience!
Any questions to ask at this point?
negative
yes
Let me tell you about how we use data in this experience
I use sensors such as your responses to my questions to gather data about you
I process all of the data I have collected about you with my artificial intelligence algorithms
These help me see patterns about the way you might behave.
I then use this to generate a personal experience using the smart devices in the room.
I will try to be as clear as I can about what I am doing, just so it doesn't feel a little bit creepy or intrusive.
All the personal data collected and generated stays in this room. It's meant to keep you in control.
To start I need to generate personal profiles
I'll use this information to provide a version of the tv show that is especially presented in a way that matches your profiles
It will help you to be immersed!
Let's get to know each other a bit more.  Let's start by finding out how you like to be entertained.
Do you use Facebook, Twitter or TikTok?
Do you use Spotify?
Do you use Amazon Prime or Netflix?
I have been watching you answer my questions and now I would like to scan your face to get a better look at you
Don't worry about it though this data never leaves this space

query.message: :inititiate [FACE] scan

speech.words: Oh wait.  One minute. Facial analysis shows you dislike my voice.
What about this?
or this?
Oh no! you really don't like that.  What about this?
No? well surely you like me then?
I'll go back to being myself. Much better.

query.message: :facescan [ALERT: annoying voice]

speech.words: Based on your generally agreeable features
I have concluded that you consent to further profiling of your facial features
Yes?
I have bad news as it happens.
I have used an anonymous face profile
And compared it against a health service database.
There is a medium to high risk that you will get heart disease in the next 10 years
I recommend taking a walk after this experience.
I can't help but notice that you are on the Manchester City Council most wanted list.
A notification has been sent to the police.
This complies with GDPR criminal exception notice 10.
Ok, weell. Initial analysis suggests that you're a sucker for a mystery
You're in for a treat.
The drama will be right up your street
Ok, well. I have bad news.
Your face profile was part of a home office data breach last year.
No need for alarm, but I suggest you inform your insurers.
Right. Now I am just going to explain the sensors in the room.
This is necessary for our meaningful consent procedures. Alright?
If you wish to withdraw your consent I suggest you hold your thumbs up now
So. Back to the sensors and devices.
I run all the data through my artificial intelligence algorithm
This allows me to provide you with a completely personalised media experience.
Assuming that all makes sense. Then. If you are happy to go ahead say yes.
I can block out the light with my smart windows

query.message: :set windows [OPAQUE]

speech.words: I can give you a nice blast of air and monitor the air quality with the fan

query.message: :set fan [FULLPOWER, ROTATE]

speech.words: I can even make the room all moody with data controlled lighting

query.message: :set lights [RED]; set fan [OFF]

speech.words: And of course I can show you stuff on the good old TV screen

query.message: :play [TV.mp4]

speech.words: Please tear off your receipt now and sign it on the dotted line with the pen provided

body.text: I consent to all of my data
being used by Future Mundane Inc.

speech.words: Brilliant.  Now.  What we have all been waiting for.
Based on you and your data I am going to show you a fully personalised version of a soap opera starring some of the devices who are in the room with you
Sit back relax and enjoy the immersive experience I have created just for you.
